1: -module(cache_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([all/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
    4: -export([insert/1,lookup/1,lookup_by_date/1,drop/1]).
    5: 
    6: all() -> [{group,tests}].
    7: 
    8: groups()-> 
    9:     [{tests,[sequense],
   10:     [insert,lookup,lookup_by_date,drop]}].
   11: 
   12: init_per_group(tests,Config)->
   13:     Table_name=table,
   14:     Drop_interval=10,
   15:     cache_server:start_link(Table_name,	
   16:     [{drop_interval,Drop_interval}]),
   17: 
   18:     [{table,Table_name},
   19:     {drop_interval,Drop_interval}|Config].
   20:     
   21: end_per_group(tests,_Config)->
   22:     cache_server:stop().
   23:     
   24: insert(Config)->
   25:     Table_name= ?config(table,Config),
   26:     ok=cache_server:insert(Table_name,1,v1,2),
   27:     ok=cache_server:insert(Table_name,2,v2,3).
   28:    
   29:    
   30: lookup(Config)->
   31:     Table_name= ?config(table,Config),
   32:     timer:sleep(2000),
   33:     [] =cache_server:lookup(Table_name,1),
   34:     [{ok,v2}] =cache_server:lookup(Table_name,2).
   35:   
   36: lookup_by_date(Config)->
   37:     Table_name= ?config(table,Config),
   38:     A=calendar:local_time(),
   39:     timer:sleep(1000),
   40:     cache_server:insert(Table_name,1,v1,5),
   41:     cache_server:insert(Table_name,2,v2,1),
   42:     cache_server:insert(Table_name,3,v3,4),
   43:     timer:sleep(3000),
   44:     B=calendar:local_time(),
   45:     {ok,[v1,v3]}=cache_server:lookup_by_date(Table_name,A,B).
   46:      
   47: 
   48: drop(Config)->
   49:     Table_name= ?config(table,Config),
   50:     Drop_interval= ?config(drop_interval,Config),
   51:     cache_server:insert(Table_name,1,v1,3),
   52:     cache_server:insert(Table_name,2,v2,(Drop_interval*1000)+1000),
   53:     timer:sleep(Drop_interval*2000),
   54:     [v2]=cache_server:get_all(Table_name).
   55:
